attributes.action: Not allow Gordon Brown to become Prime Minister without a general election being called first, so the people of this counrty can democratically choose their next leader.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NotBrown/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
